pr_title: [3.1.0] Fix HTTP response status descriptions of /documents/validate endpoint

timeline.message: Fix HTTP response status descriptions of /documents/validate endpoint

timeline.author: tgtshanika
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2610,23 +2610,13 @@ paths:
         200:
           description: |
             OK.
-            Successful response if the api name exist.
-          schema:
-            $ref: '#/definitions/Document'
-          headers:
-            Content-Type:
-              description: |
-                The content type of the body.
-              type: string
-            ETag:
-              description: |
-                Entity Tag of the response resource.
-                Used by caches, or in conditional requests (Will be supported in future).
-              type: string
+            Successful response if the document name exist.
